content.text:
Check if our files and work persist in the filesystem.

1. List contents of /root/clawd/ directory
2. Check if /root/clawd/memory/ exists and has .md files
3. Check if /root/clawd/sports-betting/ exists and has code files

Report back:
- Are the research files (memory/*.md) present?
- Are the sports betting code files present?
- Is there any indication of a mounted volume?

Just give me a quick status report.
